title: DevFest Ukraine rocked - SUMMARY
brief: GDG DevFest Ukraine 2016 - it was fun, advantageous, crowded and exciting event...

title: Thank you all for your support
brief: Our team wants to thank one more time our partners, who made GDG DevFest Ukraine 2016 possible...

title: Announcing GDG DevFest Ukraine 2017
brief: It is official. GDG DevFest Ukraine 2017 is going to take place in Lviv, on October 13-14.

title: We're looking for speakers
brief: GDG DevFest Ukraine was announced, for the sixth year in a row, the conference will bring together 900 developers, managers and...

title: First 3 speakers announced
brief: Can you believe this? Exactly 6 months are left till GDG DevFest Ukraine 2017 and we are excited to announce our first speakers!

title: Meet our Diamond Sponsor - CoreValue
brief: We are proud to announce **our Diamond Sponsor**, [CoreValue](http://corevalue.com.ua/) who has been with us for three years now!

title: Meet our Platinum Sponsor - N-iX
brief: N-iX continues to support GDG DevFest Ukraine in Lviv for a third year straight in its pursue to create quality tech events in Ukraine.

title: Meet our Platinum Sponsor - TechMagic
brief: [TechMagic](http://www.techmagic.co/dedicated-team) is a Lviv software development company with representative offices in San Francisco and Boston.

title: Where to stay in Lviv during DevFest
brief: We’ve partnered with several hotels to make your staying in Lviv the most comfortable and memorable. As our participant, you’ll get a discount for the DevFest dates.

title: How to get to Lviv and what to do afterwards
brief: For the 4th time GDG DevFest Ukraine will take place in Lviv. So what exactly is Lviv and what so special about it?
